song.englishname: On Jordan's Stormy Banks I Stand

english.segment1: . On Jordan's stormy banks I stand. And cast a wishful eye. To Canaan's fair and happy land. Where my possessions lie
english.segment2: All o'er those wide extended plains. Shines one eternal day. There God, the Son forever reigns. And scatters night away.
english.segment3: I am bound, I am bound, I am bound for the Promise Land. I am bound, I am bound, I am bound for the Promise Land
english.segment4: No chilling wind nor poisonous breath. Can reach that healthful shore. Where sickness, sorrow, pain and death. Are felt and feared no more
english.segment5: I am bound, I am bound, I am bound for the Promise Land. I am bound, I am bound, I am bound for the Promise Land
english.segment6: When shall I see that happy place. And be forever blessed. When shall I see my Father's face. And in His bosom rest
english.segment7: I am bound, I am bound, I am bound for the Promise Land. I am bound, I am bound, I am bound for the Promise Land
